longBusinessSummary: African Gold Acquisition Corporation does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger or mergers, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. African Gold Acquisition Corporation was incorporated in 2020 and is based in New York, New York.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Christopher Damon Chadwick B.Com., B.Comm (Hons), C.A., C.A. (SA), CTA
